name: spaces:peerings:destroy
desc: destroys an active peering connection in a private space

params.name: -p, --pcxid PCXID
params.desc: PCX ID of a pending peering

params.name: -s, --space SPACE
params.desc: space to get peering info from

params.name: --confirm CONFIRM
params.desc: set to PCX ID to bypass confirm prompt
